long_description: This unbelievably light Therm-a-Rest NeoAir seat fits into the palm of your hand when collapsed and inflates to a righteous, comfortable size for a trailside seat. Therm-a-Rest combines advanced, patent-pending technology and material with decades of experience to offer a virtually weightless, warm and incredibly compactible trail seat. Therm-a-Rest incorporates a patent-pending reflective barrier that returns heat back to your body. Top and bottom fabrics are constructed from 30-denier high tenacity nylon for durability and suppleness.
short_description: This unbelievably light Therm-a-Rest NeoAir seat fits into the palm of your hand when collapsed and inflates to a righteous, comfortable size for a trailside seat.
